metadata.name: Enforce all AppArmor Profiles
metadata.description:
AppArmor profiles define what resources applications are able to access. To set all profiles to enforce mode run the following command: 
$ sudo aa-enforce /etc/apparmor.d/*
To list unconfined processes run the following command: {{% if 'ubuntu' in product or 'debian' in product %}} 
$ sudo apparmor_status | grep processes
{{% else %}} 
$ sudo aa-unconfined
{{% endif %}} Any unconfined processes may need to have a profile created or activated for them and then be restarted.
metadata.rationale:
Security configuration requirements vary from site to site. Some sites may
mandate a policy that is stricter than the default policy, which is perfectly
acceptable. This recommendation is intended to ensure that any policies that
exist on the system are activated.
